rows.label: qev050501_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, hold up! Have you seen a Wrothian around here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0002
rows.name:
He got carted in with serious injuries and was
undergoing treatment, but then he just up and
disappeared without a word![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0003
rows.name:
The guy was well enough to walk, but who even knows
how a Wrothian's immune system will respond to
everything floating around New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0004
rows.name: Can you help me look for him? Er, please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_JNK0010
rows.name: Check

rows.label: qev050501_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask Sherry if she's referring to the
Wrothian you're thinking of.

rows.label: qev050501_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev050501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask for a description of the missing Wrothian.

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0005
rows.name: Wait, you know him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Yeees. Yes, he WAS extremely polite!
And he DID speak in a really stuffy way!
More than most Wrothians, I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0007
rows.name:
That's really great if it's someone you know.
It makes all of this much easier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0008
rows.name: Thanks for the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0009
rows.name: Hmm? You want a description?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, hmmm... He had a face that you don't see on
many people here in town. Fuzzy. With pointy ears.
...Er, I guess that's kinda normal for a Wrothian, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0011
rows.name: Let's seeeee... Other distinguishing features...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0012
rows.name: Oh! He kept muttering "prints gajiarg prints gajiarg."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0013
rows.name:
Some kind of Wrothian get-well spell or something,
maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0014
rows.name:
His name was, um... I know this, one second... Na?
Nu? Mo! Er, no wait...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0015
rows.name: Ah HA! It was Ni! Ni Zain. I'm sure of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0016
rows.name:
It hasn't been that long since he vanished,
so he must still be somewhere here in the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0017
rows.name: If you find him, drag his sorry ass back here, will ya?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0018
rows.name:
And I mean that literallyâ€”physically drag him if that's
what it takes. I can fix any bumps or bruises you may
give him along the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0019
rows.name:
He's got worse injuries than that to worry about,
so if he won't sit still for treatment, I'll just make him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Okay, I'll prep things here so I'm ready to start
treatment once he's back. Good luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0021
rows.name: Any luck finding our wayward Wrothian?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0022
rows.name:
I figure he can't be that hard to spot, given the funny
way he talks. Plus the whole...face thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0023
rows.name:
I've got a custom-built, extra-large bed made up and
ready for him here. Good luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0024
rows.name: Ooo! It's the BLADE from before![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0025
rows.name: You found him! Thank you so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0026
rows.name: ...Yeah, I heard he doesn't plan on coming back yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Could I maybe ask you to keep an eye on him until
he's ready to get proper treatment?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050501_MSG0028
rows.name: Otherwise, he's liable to go running off again.[ST:wait ]
